description: This file contains Flutter widget components primarily for filtering and searching notes and wallet entries in a financial or note-taking app. It defines stateless widgets that provide UI elements such as search bars, toggle chips, date pickers, category dropdowns, and clear filters buttons, all designed for embedding in different app screens.

classes.name: NotesFiltersBar
classes.description: A widget displaying a search TextField and a Favorites toggle for filtering notes.

classes.name: WalletFiltersBar
classes.description: A widget providing controls for filtering wallet entries by date range, category, and type, including a clear all button.

classes.name: _DateButton
classes.description: A private widget for selecting a date, used within WalletFiltersBar.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the UI for NotesFiltersBar or WalletFiltersBar.

methods.name: _formatDate
methods.description: Formats a DateTime object into 'yyyy-MM-dd' string.

methods.name: _pad2
methods.description: Pads an integer with a leading zero if less than 10.
